hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.elements

Class ExitableTab

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.elements.ExitableTab
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ExitableTab
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Used for insertion into JTabbedPane with JTabbedPane.setTabComponentAt() method.

    Enables calling CloseAction from the button placed in the tab. Uses NotepadButton to represent buttons so image passed in the constructor cannot be null.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic
    See Also:
    CloseAction, JTabbedPane, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExitableTab

        public ExitableTab(javax.swing.JTabbedPane pane,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   javax.swing.ImageIcon exitIcon,
                   javax.swing.ImageIcon exitHoverIcon,
                   javax.swing.ImageIcon editedIcon,
                   CloseAction closeAction,
                   boolean isEdited)
        Creates the exitable tab with the given elements.
        Parameters:
        pane - pane into which to embed the tab
        name - name of the tab
        exitIcon - icon for the exit button
        exitHoverIcon - icon for hovering over exit button
        editedIcon - icon for edited representing image
        closeAction - action that closes the tab
        isEdited - is the editor been edited
